duties_responsibilities.duty: Cover and grow the assigned territory, managing and developing manufacturer product lines in the Access Control, CCTV, Commercial A/V, Datacom/Communications & Power Management industries.
Develop and execute sales strategies and plans to drive territory growth and meet set sales targets.
Manage customer accounts, negotiate terms, and build strong relationships with clients and prospects.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine sales strategies.
Plan and attend industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase products and network with potential clients.
Measure and report on the performance of sales activities, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
